Reviews.Content: poor sevice Service was very poor.Very poor value.Health Club is outdated.Beware of extra charges.
Reviews.Author: dal1208

Reviews.Content: Wrong choice. We stayed at this hotel last week for 4 nights.We don't recommend this hotel because of:1-Location ( far for everything)2-Beach not apropriate for swimming.3-You need to pay for everything,including to stay at the pool.4-The wireless system is weak , and hard to connect at the 5th floor.5-The beds are too small , and if you need to stay with extra person in the room, you need to pay more 50 $. I already payed the extra person and if i need an roll on bed more 50..6-The hotel looks old in a area of condos.7-The valet parking is terrible ,one person for all, you need to pick your car by yourself , but pay 18 us a day.8-Few people working ( crisis).You have best hotel options in the beautiful citi of miami bech.
Reviews.Author: Eagleyed1
